
###### WELCOME TO ME PROJECT ######
install module : $ pip install cryptodo 


module use by :



  $ 1.import cryptodo 
  
    ##### encryption text #####
  
  $ 2.a = cryptodo.crypto('text',key_number)
  $ 3.print(a.encrypt())
  
  
  ##### decrypiton text #####
   
  $ 4.b = cryptodo.crypto('encrypt_text',key_number)  $ 5.print(b.decrypt())
